text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Summer camp has officially kicked off<n>this week, with King
Halo going<n>through my beach training program.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I think I've done enough<n>practice at the beach.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hehehe. ♪ I guess I'll have to<n>enlighten you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
A little bird told me about a top-secret,<n>first-rate training area
used by G1<n>racers!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
There's supposedly a super<n>advanced course in the forest
behind<n>our camp. I bet you're unaware of it.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! Of course you're unaware,<n>it's not easy to come
across this info<n>after all! Even I was only able to find<n>it
thanks to my internet sleuthing skills.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well, a lot of posts did warn that<n>amateurs are in for a world
full of pain,<n>but that doesn't apply to me.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'll handle all the planning, so don't<n>worry! Just follow my
lead!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Although King Halo seems confident<n>in her choice...

text_block_list.name: Bob-cut Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Whaaat? King, are you really going to<n>run in the forest
tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yeah, why do you ask?

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Are you sure it's a good idea? I<n>heard that the course is
kinda<n>questionable...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh, no need to fret! As a<n>first-rate racer, I'll show you
that I can<n>run any course thrown at me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
...I feel uncertain. I better prepare<n>some supplies for
tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, the day arrives.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! Good morning, Trainer!<n>Today, I grant you the
honor of<n>accompanying me as I put my perfect<n>practice
plan into action!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I've prepared thoroughly for this<n>moment.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I spent last night researching<n>everything I could about the
course.<n>Every important place has been<n>marked on my
phone's map!
choice_data_list: Is that the only map you've brought?
Is that the only map you've brought?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh please, we're in the digital age<n>now. I don't need
anything else when<n>I've got everything on my phone.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
On the other hand, it looks like you've<n>still got lots to learn. I
don't know why<n>you brought such a heavy backpack<n>
with you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well, as long as I don't have to carry<n>any excess luggage,
I'm perfectly<n>happy. All right, let's not waste any<n>more
time here! Follow me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: King Halo's adventure in the<n>mountains begins.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Phew... running on this mountain trail<n>is exhausting. There
are too many<n>uneven areas and natural obstacles<n>in the
way.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
The roads aren't paved and the<n>humidity is way too high. I
wonder<n>what temperature it is right now... Ah,<n>where's my
cellphone—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh! There's a b-b-bug!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: T-T-Trainer! Hurry up and do<n>something!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm okay. This isn't enough to<n>make me give up. All right,
let me<n>check the next destination...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer, did you happen to see<n>my phone anywhere?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
O-of course not! I'm just asking a<n>question! A first-rate
racer would<n>never lose her phone...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Come on, think... think... Aha!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That must be it! Trainer, remember the<n>place where that bug
attacked us? We<n>have to go back there!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I believe it was at the second rest<n>area. Okay, that's a great
start. I've<n>got everything under control. I just<n>need to
check the GPS on my phone...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —which I don't have!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm doing perfectly fine! This minor<n>setback isn't going to
faze me...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna find my phone, I'm gonna<n>get out of this forest,
and I'm gonna<n>go back to the camp...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, it's clear things are going<n>downhill. I unfold my
map and begin<n>marking down the places we've<n>been.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Nnngh, what could you possibly be<n>doing right now?
choice_data_list: I've prepared for this very moment.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Wait, is that a map and a compass in<n>your hands? And that
red line... is that<n>the road we've taken so far?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh my gosh, that's amazing, Trainer!<n>With this, I'll be able
to find my—

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Nngh... Yes... please...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Somehow, we managed to return in<n>one piece...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Nope, not a single scratch on me, or<n>my phone...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But, I'm surprised by how much<n>preparation you were able
to do in<n>such a short amount of time. I told<n>you about the
course only yesterday.
choice_data_list: Well, I'm trying to be a first-rate trainer.
Well, I'm trying to be a first-rate trainer.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, don't let that get to your head.<n>But I admit, it was my
fault this time. I<n>didn't do nearly enough planning.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you hadn't brought that map and<n>compass with you, we
would've<n>probably found ourselves in an even<n>bigger
mess.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: So I'm... sorry for putting you through<n>all of that.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...Hmph.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Since today's special, I'll give you a<n>bit of praise. You've
demonstrated<n>traits worthy of being with a first-rate<n>racer
such as myself.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, we should review what we<n>did today and prepare
for tomorrow's<n>forest training. This time it'll be<n>perfect.
choice_data_list: You want to go again tomorrow?!
You want to go again tomorrow?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course! Who do you think I am?<n>Words like "impossible"
and "give up"<n>don't exist in my dictionary!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Let's hurry and go back to the camp<n>now! A first-rate
trainer wouldn't<n>dream of making me wait, right?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Upon returning, we immediately begin<n>devising a strategy
for tomorrow's<n>excursion.
